title: StyleMatch
description: Fashion-tech app that lets users upload their wardrobe photos and find outfit matches online using Clarifai and Cloudinary APIs. Combines computer vision with fashion intelligence.
longDescription:
StyleMatch is a cutting-edge fashion technology application that combines computer vision with fashion intelligence to help users discover new outfit combinations. Users can upload photos of their existing wardrobe items, and the app uses advanced AI to suggest complementary pieces and complete outfits.

Built with Clarifai's computer vision API and Cloudinary's image processing capabilities, StyleMatch analyzes clothing items for color, style, pattern, and occasion appropriateness. The app then matches these items with similar pieces available online, creating a seamless bridge between personal wardrobe and shopping discovery.

This project demonstrates my expertise in integrating third-party AI services, handling image processing at scale, and creating user-friendly interfaces for complex technology. It represents the intersection of fashion, technology, and user experience design.
challenges: Integrating multiple AI APIs for accurate clothing recognition
Handling large image uploads and processing
Creating intuitive user experience for complex AI features
Optimizing performance for real-time image analysis
results: Average 3.2 seconds processing time per image
Positive user feedback on outfit suggestions
Successful integration of multiple AI services
